camera_and_perspective.view_angle: High-angle drone shot, Central perspective looking down a street axis, Mid-range urban context
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 35mm equivalent, Rectilinear projection (Vertical lines kept straight), Low distortion, Natural perspective
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Infinite depth of field, Sharp details from foreground rooftops to background skyscrapers

lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: High-Key Lighting (bright flat light), Giant Softbox effect, Very soft global illumination, Shadowless aesthetic, Even exposure
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Solid Overcast Sky (Blown-out highlights), Hazy white horizon, No direct sun visibility
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Minimal soft ambient occlusion only, No distinct cast shadows, 'Clay Render' lighting feel

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: None (Daylight dominant), Windows appear dark/neutral grey due to high exterior brightness
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Natural diffuse daylight revealing material textures (brick, concrete, stone) without harsh specular highlights

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural flat daylight, No artificial lighting active
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Soft ambient top-light on trees, No subsurface scattering effects due to lack of direct sun

color_and_grading.palette_theme: High-Key Desaturated, Scandinavian Minimalist, Dominant Off-White/Beige/Light Grey with Muted Terracotta/Brick accents
color_and_grading.temperature: Neutral Daylight (5500K) leaning towards Cool White/Clinical tone
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low Contrast (Flat curve), Matte finish, Overexposed sky (Pure White #FFFFFF), De-saturated Greens and Reds, Clean Commercial look

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: Corona Renderer (High-Albedo materials), V-Ray 6 (Dome Light only), Chaos Vantage
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Architectural Survey, 'White Model' aesthetic but textured, Clean Real Estate Photography
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Pristine textures, Sharp geometric edges, No atmospheric noise/grain

environment_textures.ground_surface: Dry light-grey asphalt roads, Traditional terracotta tiled rooftops (muted orange), Concrete flat roofs with HVAC equipment
environment_textures.foliage_style: Urban street trees with Desaturated Olive Green leaves, Uniform canopy texture
